meanings.definition: To assert or declare with confidence
meanings.sent1: He confidently asseverates his ability to solve any problem.
meanings.sent2: She asseverates that she will succeed in her new venture.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel asseverates its dominance over the backyard by chattering loudly.
